entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -24.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 9:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -24.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -27.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25 except minus 30 over northern sections. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 except minus 30 over northern sections. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
